recipes.name: Pasta Salad
recipes.instructions: Boil pasta, mix with other ingredients, season, and serve cold.

recipes.name: Tomato Soup
recipes.instructions: Cook onions and garlic, add tomatoes and broth, simmer, and blend.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry chicken until cooked, add vegetables, and stir in soy sauce and ginger.

recipes.name: Vegetable Curry
recipes.instructions: Saut√© onions and garlic, add vegetables and curry powder, stir in coconut milk, and simmer.

recipes.name: Quinoa Salad
recipes.instructions: Cook quinoa, mix with beans, corn, lime juice, and cilantro. Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Oven-Baked Salmon
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven, place salmon on a baking sheet, season with lemon, garlic, olive oil, and rosemary. Bake until cooked through.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.instructions: Layer mozzarella and tomato slices, add basil, drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

recipes.name: Banana Smoothie
recipes.instructions: Blend banana, milk, honey, and yogurt until smooth. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.instructions: Cook beef, fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, cheese, and top with salsa.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients, drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet, and bake until golden.
